---
title: "Felix Schönbrodt receives the DGPs Sponsorship Award for Quality Assurance in Psychology"
date: 2022-10-06
categories: ["Awards/Recognition"]
---


<p>On September 12, Felix Schönbrodt, managing director of the OSC, received the Promotion Prize for Quality Assurance in Psychology. He has been working for many years to anchor the topic of Open Science in research and teaching and in the training of young scientists.</p>
<p>"With the award of the Promotion Prize for Quality Assurance in Psychology to Felix Schönbrodt, we honor a pioneer of the Open Science movement this year," explains DGPs President Markus Bühner. "With his commitment, Felix Schönbrodt has significantly influenced the development of the Open Science movement in Germany as well as set an international course."</p>
